leaflet.candidateName: Gail Lockett, Roy Molson, John Povey

messages.content: The elections that take place on the 7th of May this year will be pivotal in deciding who you want to have representing you at parliament, district and town council.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The economy shows signs of recovery and to continue a majority Conservative government needs to be returned so that the journey to sustainable economic prosperity is kept on track.
Income tax reductions for 30 million people.
Benefits capped and more people back into employment.
An in/out referendum on European Union membership in 2017.

issues.brexitEurope: An in/out referendum on European Union membership in 2017.
issues.economy: The economy shows signs of recovery and to continue a majority Conservative government needs to be returned so that the journey to sustainable economic prosperity is kept on track.
issues.socialWelfare: Benefits capped and more people back into employment.

housing.content: The local Conservative team have a record of delivery attracting over £120m investment within the Moorlands economy.

images.caption: Pictures of Gail Lockett, Roy Molson, and John Povey.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The local Conservative team have a record of delivery attracting over £120m investment within the Moorlands economy. There has been no increase in the Moorlands council tax for the last five years.
